title: DPM Dar chairs high-level meeting to review preparations for President Ilhamâ€™s visit
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 09 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister (DPM) and Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Tuesday chaired a high-level meeting to holistically review preparations and arrangements for the upcoming official visit of President of Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev.
The meeting especially focused on trade and investment relations between the two brotherly countries, Ministry of Foreign Affairs posted on X account.
The meeting was attended by Ministers for Commerce, Planning and Development, Privatization, Communication and Power along with the Ambassador of the Republic of Azerbaijan to Pakistan Khazar Farhadov and senior officials of Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
